realwork.description: A modern and professional web development company website designed in Figma and developed using React, TailwindCSS, and custom CSS to ensure a fully responsive and seamless user experience.
A beautifully crafted wedding planner website designed and developed in WordPress using Elementor and custom CSS, delivering a stunning, responsive, and client-centric experience.

I designed and developed a responsive Ecommerce website with mulitple customer groups/prices for retail, wholesale and dropship for my client on Shopify.. I utilized Shopify, Custom HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

As the Technical Web Support Specialist, my responsibilities include build and maintain monthly blog posts on their Wordpress website. I utilize Wordpress, Custom HTML, and CSS. My other responsibilities include Mailchimp/Jobber & Zapier/Jobber integrations,  full website audits & reporting, plus additional website maintenance and partner support.

featured.description: This is an eCommerce website that allows user to view the optimal layout for the site depending on their device's screen size, add to cart and checkout

others.description: This is loopstudio landing page, it allows users to view the optimal layout for the site depending on their device's screen size and see hover states for all interactive elements on the page

The web app generate random recipes to any ingredients provided.The main aim of this application is to incorporate two APIs (Edemam and Giphy)  and use the  fetched datas to update the page with one api depending on the other.

In this web app, you can signup and post any used item/s that you would like to get rid of for free or in exchange of something that some other user posted, other than throwing it away to reduce waste and its impact to the environment.

This is a school individual project where we were tasked to design a Weather Dashboard. This appplcation fetches data for any city searched from open weather map API and use the fetched data to update the page.
This is Work day planner web application, it is like a to-do app which helps you plan your work day. In the present time the color of the task block is green and if past the hour it changes to grey.
This is my first react personal portfolio website that i designed after the completion of my bootcamp to showcase the acquired skillsets
